_meta.note: Feedback system design. Channels defined but not yet operational. Will activate post-launch.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: New insight that contradicts assumptions or reveals unmet need
feedback_channels.notes: Most valuable channel. Mom Test methodology. 20-30 min each. Target 5-20 interviews before launch.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: NPS Detractor score (0-6) triggers immediate personal outreach
feedback_channels.log_location: Customer Data Model (NPS Score, Product Feedback fields)
feedback_channels.notes: Short survey: NPS question + one open-ended 'What would make this perfect?' question.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: Negative review (<3 stars) triggers personal response within 24 hours
feedback_channels.notes: Mine for VOC quotes (positive and negative). Respond to every review publicly.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: Product quality complaint triggers quality review. Repeat issue (3+ tickets) triggers product team escalation.
feedback_channels.notes: Tag every ticket by category. Look for patterns weekly. Support is the #1 early warning system.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: Negative mention triggers response within 4 hours. Positive mention triggers engagement + screenshot for social proof.
feedback_channels.notes: Monitor brand mentions, competitor mentions, and category keywords across Reddit, Twitter/X, Instagram, Facebook groups.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: Any direct reply to a marketing email is treated as high-priority feedback
feedback_channels.notes: Email replies are gold. People who reply to marketing emails are highly engaged. Every reply gets a personal response.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: New churn reason identified triggers product or experience review
feedback_channels.notes: Short survey at cancellation: 'What's the #1 reason you're cancelling?' + open text field. Track reason distribution monthly.

feedback_channels.action_trigger: NPS drop of 5+ points month-over-month triggers root cause analysis
feedback_channels.notes: Monthly NPS tracks brand health over time. Segment by cohort, acquisition source, and product to identify patterns.

checklist: Review all new VOC quotes added this week (from all channels)
Update VOC Database with new quotes, tagged by category and use case
Check NPS trend - any Detractors that need personal follow-up?
Review support ticket patterns - any new recurring issues?
Update Customer Archetypes if new insight challenges current personas
Document one 'surprising finding' even if it seems minor
weekly_customer_insight_ritual.output: Weekly Customer Insight Brief (shared with team/stakeholders)

composition: 1-2 customers from each primary ICP segment
Rotate 2-3 members every 6 months to keep perspectives fresh
structure: 15 min: Share what we shipped based on their last feedback
20 min: Present upcoming product/experience changes for input
20 min: Open discussion - what's on their mind?
5 min: Thank you + exclusive early access to something as appreciation
incentives: Early access to all new products and flavors
Name recognition (with permission) in brand communications
Direct line to founder for feedback anytime
